column5: Finally got on the bay this morning. To my surprise,we had 5-6 " of solid black ice. Managed a bunch of herring and a whitie. Lost one near the hole. Fished with a bunch of buddies.       My oldest even made it out this morning with us.   Terry having a nap    Hey fishfarmer, it,s still getting used. Gave it to my son.
Way to go B. That froze fast!!! Who towed Terry back?
I wasn’t having a nap. Turkey. LOL it was good to get out
Terry have gas? you guys in a hut and him in quarantine?
Nice warm day. Who need a shelter till the wind picks up

I was working in Barrie today.   I noticed that the huts all seemed to be on the south side of the bay.   Is that because the ice is safer; or, because the fishing is better there?  I am hoping to get out on the bay after work a few times.  I am working on the north side of the bay.
HEY... Lloyd's looking for that chair !
Nice. Glad to hear you guys got out.

Hey John It,s the best ice in the bay right now as it,s been solid up for a week. The fishing is ok. It,s my first ice spot til other areas firm up. It made another 1.5 " over night, -18 at 6am this morning when I was all set up.  I was sitting in the same area as yesterday and had 7" this morning.  It,s not the same all over. Knowing the bay and it,s habits is a big plus.  Another nice thing about this spot is parents can take their kids out . Not a long walk and can catch perch,herring ,smelt and white fish.
not that chair, the bigger one that goes in my clam
Sure looks like you are pulling a Roy...!
I had the camera  down and the monitor in my lap   It was -14 I think I would have froze to death if I fell asleep.  Lol
I still would of dragged your sorry ass off the ice and brought you home, then drove the yamadoo  home. . ..
And leave the body on the porch, Chevy Chase"Vacation" style???

Hi Bro, that's great your son has it, hope he has the luck I had with it. Wish now I should have kept it. That Clam Scout I bought is a little small for 3 holes, one for trans, 2 to fish and with heater, it's tight. Seeing you guys have ice, I may have to make the trek up to Simcoe. I don't think we'll get safe ice for the harbor here and Long Point is going to be iffy. Love to do the Whitie thing one day. All I need to see now is seeing you with a couple flopping around your feetwill just get me craving.
Just had to share...
Had a permanent hut for years on Simcoe and you wouldn't believe the stuff that happened to my hut, your joke was one of them. Little to say I had to move it, wife was pretty disgusted.

what a beauty weekend it was, not a cloud in the sky and crisp -20 mornings and dead calm -10 sunny afternoons. I swear to god it feels 100 times warmer when its -10 sunny and calm then when its 0 and cloudy. My buddy couldnt help falling asleep either, those sunny afternoons called for a nap. I even got a sunburn, and met a local who directed me the way of a bush trail that I was not aware of that allows me to fish in one of my favourite fishing grounds. Lots of people were concerned about this ice season, i think we are just getting started on a long hardwater season. Time will tell!
Thanks, the north side will probably be safe by the time I can get out.
I,ll do my best this weekend brudder.
some good ice will be built this weekend!  Looks like it was fun!  Cheers!
